channel.title: People cannot connect to my server
channel.description:
So I can connect to my own server, and people can get all the way to the log-in screen but they get error connection to server. I portforwarded correctly and I have a static Ip. Does anyone know what the problem could be? If you are good with servers I would love to teamview with someone.
Thanks.

item.title: People cannot connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @JonTheKing JonTheKing
item.description:
@JonTheKing wrote:

I turned my firewall off, My ports are open and forwarded, and I have tried 4 different sources.

Read full topic
